title: Top Gainers and Losers today on 4 October, 2024: Infosys, Oil & Natural Gas Corporation, Mahindra & Mahindra, Bajaj Finance among most active stocks; Check full list here
description: Top Gainers and Losers Today : The Sensex lost 808.65 points, or -0.98, to settle at 82497.1, while the Nifty lost 235.5 points, or -0.93, to close at 25250.1.
content: Top Gainers and Losers Today : **Top Gainers and Losers Today**: The Nifty index closed at 25,250.1, reflecting a decline of 0.93%. Throughout the trading session, the Nifty reached a high of 25,485.05 and a low of 24,966.8. Meanwhile, the Sensex traded within a range of 83,368.32 to 81,532.68, ultimately closing down by 0.98% at 82,497.1, which is 808.65 points below the opening price.The Midcap index underperformed compared to the Nifty 50, as the Nifty Midcap 50 closed 1.06% lower. In addition, small-cap stocks also lagged behind, with the Nifty Small Cap 100 ending at 18,952.6, down by 193.95 points, marking a decline of 1.02%. The Nifty 50 has yielded the following returns:- In the last week: -4.42%- In the last month: -0.71%- In the last three months: 2.96%- In the last six months: 11.13%- In the last year: 28.73%The top gainers in the Nifty index included Infosys (up 1.31%), Oil & Natural Gas Corporation (up 1.10%), HDFC Life Insurance Company (up 0.93%), Tech Mahindra (up 0.77%), and Wipro (up 0.64%). Conversely, the top losers in the Nifty index were Mahindra & Mahindra (down 3.59%), Bajaj Finance (down 2.99%), Nestle India (down 2.87%), Hero Motocorp (down 2.51%), and Bharat Petroleum Corporation (down 2.47%). The Bank Nifty closed at 51,845.2, with an intraday high of 52,358.35 and a low of 51,347.25.
